channel.title: Android games: Pixel Dungeon
channel.description:
If you're into rogue-like travel the dungeon RPG-ish pixelly games, this one is a winner. I've played way too many games and am hooked. Here's the link to it if you want to try it out. It's a bit boring in the beginning, but once you get the hang of it (aka beat the first boss), it gets a lot more interesting. It's deceptively simple. I haven't been able to beat the game yet. I've only gotten to the 20th floor.
Here's the link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.watabou.pixeldungeon
Anyone know any other great android games? (Nothing like Deer Hunter, Candy Crush Saga, etc...)

Here’s the link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.watabou.pixeldungeon

flappy bird

Scored 19 and quit. Yes, I was completely content with 19.[/quote]

item.title: Android games: Pixel Dungeon
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:2, topic:538669”]Looks pretty fun, I don’t have an android but I have bluestacks(You can play andriod games on PC) so I’ll probably end up downloading it.

My favorite game though is Clash of Clans, you should try it.[/quote]

I’ve tried that, but I have freemiums.

thakillah:

I’m addicted.

Awesome! How far have you gotten?

Read full topic

item.description:
